episodes.name: Project Alpha Kickoff
episodes.body: Started Project Alpha today. John has been assigned as the lead engineer.

episodes.name: Project Alpha Blocked
episodes.body: Project Alpha is now blocked. The API integration with the payment provider is failing. John is investigating.

episodes.name: Project Alpha Leadership Change
episodes.body: John has been reassigned to Project Beta. Sarah is now leading Project Alpha.

episodes.name: Project Alpha Unblocked
episodes.body: Sarah resolved the payment provider API issue. Project Alpha is now back in progress. Deadline moved to January 20th.

episodes.name: Project Alpha Complete
episodes.body: Sarah completed Project Alpha ahead of the new deadline. All tests passing. Deployed to production.

body.notes: Sarah took over from John due to reassignment to Project Beta.
